title: Looking for Holistic MD/DO
author: Stephan Themis
cleaned_text: | | |Looking for Holistic MD/DO: ||Back to |[Articles](index.php?page=articles&action=browseArticles&subjectID=23) by The Center for Natural Family Medicine Lauren Feder, M.D. Los Angeles CA US 90048 We are looking for an enthusiastic holistic physician, MD/DO, in internal or family medicine to see adults for primary care. The office is headed by a physician who also specializes in homeopathy and holistic medicine for families. No knowledge in holistic medicine is necessary, but having an interest is a plus. Opportunity for growth. Please send CV to [office@drfeder.com](mailto:office@drfeder.com) or call us
